author: Leslie Brody
title: A Class On ‘Life Knowledge’ Offered at a New York City Charter School
text:
When Ian Rowe moved his charter schools’ headquarters to the South Bronx just more than a year ago, he was dismayed to see a bright blue truck driving by, emblazoned with the slogan, “Who’s Your Daddy?”
The mobile laboratory sold paternity tests as it roamed neighborhoods where, federal data showed, most children lived with a single parent. About 40% of U.S. babies are born outside marriage, up from 10% 50 years ago.
